channel.title: Loading the client
channel.description:
Ok well im trying to click and load the soulsplit client to play and i keep recieving this error... it says sorry and error has occured while loading soulsplit. to fix this try the following (in order):
1.try closing alll webbrowsers and reloading. 2.try cleaning your webbrowers cache 3.try using a different game world 4. try rebotting your computer 5.try slecting a different version of java.
does this mean that i have been banned from the server or does it mean that theres a problem with the server please if anyone can help please help me. thank you very much for your help.

item.title: Loading the client
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

@ marine, i saw that, but i didnt know if he actually went ahead and did it, since he said " does that mean im banned or something" so i was just trying to make sure he would actually try it before he got worried, also UnCalled, i didnt think about that

Read full topic

item.title: Loading the client
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Delete the cache and reload the page. That usually works; if you’re talking about trying to play the real SoulSplit. If you have SoulSplit’s source, then your cache is not downloading properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Loading the client
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

@Baddy

[quote=“ilovegirls51, post:1, topic:397879”]to fix this try the following (in order):

1.try closing alll webbrowsers and reloading.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Loading the client
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Or just do what i do, exit out of the browser (completely not just the tab), and go back to the webpage, that always fixes it for me

Read full topic

item.title: Loading the client
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

This belongs in Client Help. Does this happen often? If so, this might be because you don’t have one of your paths set. In

Loveandpower’s case(in the web client errors thread), the issue was that he didn’t set the path to the Raw folder which is in

Client.java. For more information on web client errors, go here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Loading the client
item.dc:creator: @ilovegirls51 ilovegirls51
item.description:
@ilovegirls51 wrote:

Ok well im trying to click and load the soulsplit client to play and i keep recieving this error… it says sorry and error has occured while loading soulsplit. to fix this try the following (in order):

1.try closing alll webbrowsers and reloading.
2.try cleaning your webbrowers cache
3.try using a different game world
4. try rebotting your computer
5.try slecting a different version of java.

does this mean that i have been banned from the server or does it mean that theres a problem with the server please if anyone can help please help me. thank you very much for your help.
